name: Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride
indications: diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection effective adults pediatric patients , premature infants neonates , following conditions oral form impractical :
contraindications: product intravenous intramuscular . diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection indicated oral form impractical . individualized according needs response patient .
warningsAndPrecautions: diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection , usp 50 mg/ml 1 ml vials packaged 25s ndc : 70518-1082-01 ndc : 70518-1082-00 packaging : 25 1 package packaging : 1 ml 1 vial , type 0 storage protect light . keep covered carton time . store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) , excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
indications_original: Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection is effective in adults and pediatric patients, other than premature infants and neonates, for the following conditions when the oral form is impractical:
contraindications_original:
THIS PRODUCT IS FOR INTRAVENOUS OR INTRAMUSCULAR ADMINISTRATION ONLY.
                  Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection is indicated when the oral form is impractical.
                  DOSAGE SHOULD BE INDIVIDUALIZED ACCORDING TO THE NEEDS AND THE RESPONSE OF THE PATIENT.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection, USP 50 mg/mL
                  1 mL vials packaged in 25s
                  NDC: 70518-1082-01
                  NDC: 70518-1082-00
                  PACKAGING: 25 in 1 PACKAGE
                  PACKAGING: 1 mL in 1 VIAL, TYPE 0
                  
                  Storage
                  Protect from light. Keep covered in carton until time of use. Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F), excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
